title: Watch | Wall colours that can reduce stress
text: Watch | Wall colours that can reduce stress These five wall colours are the harbinger of positivity, growth and peace. Watch the video. TNN | Updated: Feb 21, 2017, 12.33 PM IST Home is where heart is! After a stressful long day, all we aspire is to relax in our cozy abodes. Though adding to the comfort provided by a comfortable couch or a cozy bed, the contribution of wall colours mostly go unnoticed. According to various architectural sciences, the wall paints play an integral part in providing peace of mind and positive thinking. These five wall colours are the harbinger of positivity, growth and peace. Watch the video here: 5 wall colours that can reduce stress 00:40 ( Image credits in the video: Dulux Paints and Thinkstock Images) Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
